ROBUTEK2_DESCRIPTION: Robůtek V2 is robotic platform designed for teaching programming and robotics
ROBUTEK2_READSENSOR_TOOLTIP: Read value from the specified sensor
ROBUTEK2_SETSTATUSLED_TOOLTIP: Set the status LED state (0 = off, 1 = on)
ROBUTEK2_MOVE_MESSAGE0:
on $[ROBUTEK2_INSTANCE] move
-1 is full left, 0 is straight and 1 is full right
curve $[CURVE] (range -1 to 1)
for $[DURATION] $[UNIT]
ROBUTEK2_MOVE_TOOLTIP: Move the robot in a curve for the specified duration (in milliseconds)
ROBUTEK2_ROTATE_TOOLTIP: Rotate the robot by the specified angle (in degrees)
ROBUTEK2_GETHEADING_TOOLTIP: Get the current heading of the robot
ROBUTEK2_GETHEADINGCLAMPED_TOOLTIP: Get the current heading of the robot, clamped to 0-360 degrees
ROBUTEK2_RESETHEADING_TOOLTIP: Reset the heading of the robot to 0 degrees
ROBUTEK2_SETSPEED_TOOLTIP: Set the speed of the robot (in mm/s)
ROBUTEK2_GETSPEED_TOOLTIP: Get the current speed of the robot (in mm/s)
ROBUTEK2_SETRAMP_TOOLTIP: Set the acceleration/deceleration ramp time (in milliseconds)
ROBUTEK2_GETRAMP_TOOLTIP: Get the current acceleration/deceleration ramp time (in milliseconds)
ROBUTEK2_CLOSE_TOOLTIP: Close the Robůtek V2 instance and stop the robot
